title: To impose sanctions with respect to economic or industrial espionage by foreign adversarial companies, and for other purposes.
latest_action: House - 02/21/2025 Referred to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on the Judiciary, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned. ( All Actions )
status: This bill has the status Introduced
